title: Index Pointing At The Viewer Medium Light Skin Tone
alsoKnownAs: Pointing Finger Medium Light Skin Tone
description: A hand with an index finger pointing directly at the viewer, with a medium-light skin tone. It's often used to draw attention, accuse, or single someone out.
apple_vendor_description: The index finger pointing directly at the viewer, shown with a medium-light skin tone on Apple devices, is a bold and direct communication tool. Apple's realistic lighting and subtle 3D shading create a sense of presence and emphasis, with the fingertip clearly defined. This emoji, featuring smooth gradients and soft rounded edges, is commonly used to draw attention, make a specific request, or signify a direct instruction.
